title: Cream of Potato and Leek Soup
ingredients: ['50g butter', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '2 leeks, sliced', '1/4 onion, finely chopped', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste', '1 tablespoon cornflour', '500ml chicken stock', '750g potatoes (about 5 potatoes), peeled and diced', '250ml cream']
